column3: “This combines 2 of my favorite strains from 2 different decades.  I loved skunk #1 in the  late 90s and early 2000s  What I Love about skunk #1 is its versatility and resistance to tolerance.  Ive came across hundreds of strains in my life and some were great but often times the high thc strains became like drinking decaf after a few weeks of daily use.  S1 can be smoked morning, afternoon or evening, its downside is...”

“Location: L'Eagle Services 
THC: 24.12%
CBD: 0.00%

Appearance Rating: 5.00
Appearance Description: There are a lot of healthy sized flowers, many of which are chunky yet fluffy. They are a vibrant lime green and have tons of fat red, orange hairs. They are covered in trichomes and are well manicured. 

Taste Rating: 5.00
Taste Description:  I absolutely love the taste on this strain. I get a lot of sweet citrus mixe...”

“Clearly one of the dankest weed i have ever smoke. This shit smells like a death skunk and it gets you fucking damn high at the second the smoke is out of your mouth. The buds are little and dense. 5% leafs in the bag. I plaid basketball on this shit and i thought i was Kobe Bryant. This shit is good for homework, gaming, hanging out with friends or simply for an awesome adventure in the wild world  we're in.”

“Definitely going on my favourites list. This has a nice pungent, citrus/fuel scent and tastes fantastic.  It's not a harsh smoke either.  The high is awesome. It's very uplifting yet relaxing. If you have work to do around the house, this bud's for you.  It definitely hits you in the head before the body but it's a smooth transition as it creeps on. No paranoia or anxiety with one, and I am susceptible to that with m...”

“Oh....My.....Word....💜💜👍👍.
First of all, I picked up THC-A sugar crystals by Venom Extracts. There's a very noticeable difference from THC & THC-A. Maybe you've seen some dispensaries selling it in the concentrates section, but it normally goes for $40-$60 per HALF gram! 
I scored 2 different half grams.
One small dab, and I mean small like the head of a pin, has me so baked it's crazy. Only $24 for the gram!
The...”

“This strain smokes very nice-isn't too harsh on the lungs, and gives both wonderful cerebral and body effects. Was a little shocked when I originally smoked, because my dispensary had this labeled as an indica (I could see that if you smoke a lot in a row, but I feel the effects are more energizing and uplifting).”

“This is the best sativa Ive found in Denver so far. Its a darker colored sativa hybrid. Its fluffier bud frosted in trichomes. Its a very arousing strain and is great for intimacy.  OG Skunk manages to be euphoric and uplifting, while also helping to relieve stress and anxiety. A rare find!”

“Location: L'Eagle Services 
THC: 24.12%

Appearance Rating: 5.00
Appearance Description: There are a lot of healthy sized flowers, many of which are chunky yet fluffy. They are a vibrant lime green and have tons of fat red, orange hairs. They are covered in trichomes and are well manicured. 

Taste Rating: 5.00
Taste Description:  I absolutely love the taste on this strain. I get a lot of sweet citrus mixe...”

“I picked this up @ Leagle in Denver (shout out to the awesome peeps there) 
I was on my way to see Carlos Santana @ Red Rocks and asked the budtender what he would smoke if he were going and he didn't hesitate to recommend this strain. Went back the following day to pick up some more☺️
Really awesome high!!! For live music my go to strain right now! Very relaxing, uplifting and long lasting effects. Personally I like...”
“Very fast acting, and a very light-feeling, deep-seated high. This is the saturday and sunday afternoon strain for coasting.:)”

“OG body buzz 
Skunk head high
Strong and easy on anxiety”

“Super good strain for the super bowl! Hit one GB and felt the effects kick in almost immediately. Once you sit down you'll most likely not want to get back up, so get your drink before that because your mouth will be super dry! Good relaxing strain that made me very happy and laughy. Look at memes, even the dumb tom Brady ones will make you laugh!”
“Made me laugh a lot and made really happy.”
“This strain is yummy. Not only does it taste good, be it is smooth when smoked and provides you with a very uplifting high :) my new favorite!”
“Perhaps its because i grav-bonged a skunk strain, but i hated the flavor, loved the smell though, and the high was pretty intense after a couple grams.”

“This Hybrid was 60/40 Sativa dominate & gave me a clear headed high making me uplifted, happy, & mellow. Taste & smell was a skunky citrus. Buds had different shades of light medium green colors made lighter by all the white fuzzy hairs & trichomes caked on. Bright light orange pistils finished off the buds beautiful looks. ENJOY :)”

“Super good strain for the super bowl! Hit one GB and felt the effects kick in almost immediately. Once you sit down you'll most likely not want to get back up, so get your drink before that because your mouth will be super dry! Good relaxing strain that made me very happy and laughy. Look at memes, even the dumb tom Brady ones will make you laugh!”
“strong smell n bold taste, I love it”

“nice strong medication f/ a variety of ailments,pain,insomnia,anxiety,high bp,nausea and more.skunky smelling w/ a little spice.the taste is earthy and spicy.half a joint works good f/ starters (for me at least).nice hard,dense buds.i love it and will smoke it again.oh yeah,it gets u pretty fucking high too!”
“While bearing a unique flavour, this strain defies the ugly part of its name as well as provides mood lifting effects. An easy 5.0 from me!”
“smooth and strong smell like wonder women but sooo strong”

“Overall a fantastic strain for those suffering from mental health illnesses. 
After a week of severe depression and anxiety, and many dissociative episodes, I was able to get up take a shower and start cleaning my house. 
If I could keep the strain on stock forever, it would be right there next to my green crack and blue dream. No couch lock, and no weird headache, I did hyperfocus on whatever task I said before me. ...”
“Picked up 33% thc heavy hitter and straight 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥😍🔥🔥🔥😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍 go now and pick up some”

“Finding ANY Skunk in Vegas is almost like hitting a Royal Flush...flower would have been super, but with shatter, it don't matter........a little less skunky than flower would be, but you can sure tell the underlying chemistry in the terps present.  This makes a great topping to this years harvest of Alien Tahoe....if you can find it, snap it up, as I drove from the Northwest part of the valley all the way to the Hen...”

“love it.the skunky smell hits u as u open the bag.really nice,strong hybrid from 2 good parents.excellent f/ medication.pain,anxiety,insomnia,it all gets taken care of.the taste is a bit more plain w/ a little spice and earthy,beautiful nice solid heavily compacted buds.u know it`s gonna be good as soon as u see it.it`s gonna be one of my faves for sure.”
“This is a very nice and pungent strain, very nice smoke, makes me feel uplifted and gives the munch as well”

“Location: Lovely Buds 
Farm: Sweet Water Farms 
Total Cannaboids: 24.2%
Terpene Profile: Myrcene, Pinene & Humulene
The nugs were covered with crystals. The smell and taste were outstanding. I grind and vape mine.
After a couple of hits I could feel it instantly.”
“I have this in a disposable hash oil tank and its amazing, a couple of puffs starts sending me away on a nice high”
“Super Giggly! Loved it. Felt Stoney but not out of control and didn't suffer any significant sides.”
“not a huge fan of skunk smell. the taste was average”
“great taste and bold smell, loving it!!”

“Holy smokes! Best weed I've ever smoked. Very strong skunk smell carried me back to my High school days. Very rich woodsy citrus taste. Excellent choice to share with friends at a gathering. Happy giggly, inspiring, sensual blast! Can't wait to get my hands on some seeds.”
“VER¥¥~°^G00D^°~Strain, MANN”
“pretty nice ol school type weed feel good chill vibe heavy smoke”
“I'm not an expert when it comes to weed but this stuff is bomb, defiantly in my top 5 category”
“My two favorite strains combined. ...:)”
“the perfect compliment to a new game of thrones episode”

“first off, this smells very strong. I'd say it smells like the woods or some out door shit. It's extremely smooth, little to no coughing, no burning, very smooth high. Be prepared for some spiritual stuff. Kind of unlocks a side of you that you never knew. My favorite strain to date, a small amount of a small bowl will last you for hours and you'll never feel better, before during or after. I just grinder up my last ...”

“Nice dense nugs, with orange hairs. Tastes like other skunks or cheese; real earthy and stings the nostrils. The 60/40 sativa makes it hit the head real quick then the indica kicks in and relaxes the muscles. Leaving you with a headband feel but your still able to be productive.”
